quests.desc: Welcome to TextWorld! Here is your task for today. First of all, you could, like, recover the fresh laundry scented latchkey from the table. And then, make absolutely sure that the fresh laundry scented passageway is unlocked. And then, look and see that the fresh laundry scented passageway within the study is open. Then, make an effort to travel south. And then, ensure that the gate in the spare room is open. And then, move east. Then, go south. After that, make an effort to travel east. Then, try to go east. With that done, pick up the shadfly from the shelf. And once you've done that, you win!
commands: take fresh laundry scented latchkey from table
unlock fresh laundry scented passageway with fresh laundry scented latchkey
take fresh laundry scented latchkey from table
unlock fresh laundry scented passageway with fresh laundry scented latchkey

infos.name: studio
infos.desc:
Ah, the studio. This is some kind of studio, really great ordinary vibes in this place, a wonderful ordinary atmosphere. And now, well, you're in it. The room seems oddly familiar, as though it were only superficially different from the other rooms in the building.

 You can see [if c_0 is locked]a locked[else if c_0 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] bureau.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The bureau contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] The bureau is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] You can make out a shelf. The shelf is normal.[if there is something on the s_0] On the shelf you can make out [a list of things on the s_0]. Suddenly, you bump your head on the ceiling, but it's not such a bad bump that it's going to prevent you from looking at objects and even things.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0] But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of trash. This always happens![end if] Look over there! a stand. [if there is something on the s_2]You see [a list of things on the s_2] on the stand.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2]But the thing is empty. Hm. Oh well[end if] You make out a chair. The chair is normal.[if there is something on the s_3] On the chair you make out [a list of things on the s_3].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3] Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it.[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: canteen
infos.desc:
You've entered a canteen. You begin to take stock of what's here.

 You can see a platter. [if there is something on the s_4]On the platter you make out [a list of things on the s_4].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_4]But the thing is empty, unfortunately.[end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the east. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: cellar
infos.desc:
You've entered a cellar.

 You bend down to tie your shoe. When you stand up, you notice a workbench. [if there is something on the s_5]On the workbench you can see [a list of things on the s_5].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_5]Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it. It would have been so cool if there was stuff on the workbench! oh well.[end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the north. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: basement
infos.desc:
You are in a basement. A normal kind of place. You can barely contain your excitement.



 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gateway leading north. There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading west.

infos.name: study
infos.desc:
You are in a study. A standard kind of place.

 You make out a table. [if there is something on the s_1]You see [a list of things on the s_1] on the table.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1]But the thing is empty.[end if] You make out a mantelpiece. The mantelpiece is normal.[if there is something on the s_6] On the mantelpiece you make out [a list of things on the s_6].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_6] Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though. Hopefully this doesn't make you too upset.[end if]

 There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading east. There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] fresh laundry scented passageway leading south.

infos.name: restroom
infos.desc:
Of every restroom you could have sauntered into, you had to saunter into a typical one. You begin to take stock of what's in the room.



 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading east. There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gateway leading south. There is an unblocked exit to the north. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: vault
infos.desc:
Look at you, bigshot, walking into a vault like it isn't some huge deal. Let's see what's in here.

 You rest your hand against a wall, but you miss the wall and fall onto a suitcase.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The suitcase contains [a list of things in the c_1].[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] The suitcase is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north.

infos.name: attic
infos.desc:
You are in an attic. A standard one.



There is an unblocked exit to the south. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: bedroom
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a bedroom. A standard kind of place.



You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: chamber
infos.desc:
Okay, so you're in a chamber, cool, but is it standard? You better believe it is.

 You can make out a fudge scented safe.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The fudge scented safe contains [a list of things in the c_2]. Now that's what I call TextWorld![end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] The fudge scented safe is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] What's that over there? It looks like it's a safe, so there's that.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The safe contains [a list of things in the c_3], so there's that.[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] The safe is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading west. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: cookhouse
infos.desc:
You arrive in a cookhouse. An ordinary kind of place.



There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: cookery
infos.desc:
You've entered a cookery.

 You smell a sickening smell, and follow it to a bowl. The bowl is typical.[if there is something on the s_7] On the bowl you see [a list of things on the s_7]. You shudder, but continue examining the room.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_7] The bowl appears to be empty. Hm. Oh well[end if] You scan the room for a plate, and you find a plate. [if there is something on the s_8]You see [a list of things on the s_8] on the plate.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_8]Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though. What's the point of an empty plate?[end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: office
infos.desc:
You find yourself in an office. A normal kind of place.

 You can make out a cake scented box.[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The cake scented box contains [a list of things in the c_4]. Huh, weird.[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] The cake scented box is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: recreation zone
infos.desc:
You are in a recreation zone. A normal kind of place. You begin to take stock of what's here.



There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: bedchamber
infos.desc:
Fancy seeing you here. Here, by the way, being the bedchamber.

 You can make out a coffer. There's something strange about this thing being here, but you don't have time to worry about that now.[if c_5 is open and there is something in the c_5] The coffer contains [a list of things in the c_5]. Now why would someone leave that there?[end if][if c_5 is open and the c_5 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if]

 There is [if d_4 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading west. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: spare room
infos.desc:
You are in a spare room. An ordinary kind of place. You begin to take stock of what's in the room.



 There is [if d_4 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading east. There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] fresh laundry scented passageway leading north.

infos.name: pantry
infos.desc:
You arrive in a pantry. A standard kind of place.

 You make out a counter. The counter is standard.[if there is something on the s_10] On the counter you can make out [a list of things on the s_10].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_10] Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it.[end if] You see a rough stand. [if there is something on the s_9]You see [a list of things on the s_9] on the stand.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_9]However, the stand, like an empty stand, has nothing on it. You make a mental note to not get your hopes up the next time you see a stand in a room.[end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north.

You're now in a shower. You begin to take stock of what's here.

 You make out a rack. [if there is something on the s_11]On the rack you see [a list of things on the s_11]. Hmmm... what else, what else?[end if][if there is nothing on the s_11]But the thing is empty, unfortunately.[end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the south.

walkthrough: take fresh laundry scented latchkey from table
unlock fresh laundry scented passageway with fresh laundry scented latchkey

objective: Welcome to TextWorld! Your first objective is to pick up the fresh laundry scented latchkey from the table in the study. If you can get your hands on the fresh laundry scented latchkey, assure that the fresh laundry scented passageway inside the study is unlocked with the fresh laundry scented latchkey. Then, assure that the fresh laundry scented passageway within the study is ajar. After that, attempt to venture south. Following that, make sure that the gate is opened. And then, try to move east. Once you accomplish that, take a trip south. And then, try to move east. After that, move east. Following that, recover the shadfly from the shelf. And once you've done that, you win!
